attributes.action: increase the maximum towing width (2.3m)of a trailer behind a vehicle of 3499kg or less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the current maximum towing width of a vehicle with a MGVW less than 3500kg is 2.3 metres (7ft 6inch) regardless if the vehicle is well within its maximum towing capacity. wider trailers or caravans of such can easily towed safely with the aid of "wing mirror" extenders. the maximum width can safely extended to include trailers upto a max width the same as vehicles with MGVW over 3500kg and over (2.55m or 8 ft 3 inches
